name: Coffee Maniac
description:
In Coffee Maniac you can experience the joy of drinking coffee in the morning.
Move the cup to your mouth and take a big sip of coffee but don't spill it!
With each caffeine delivery, you move faster and less predictable. Enter the trip phase and become one with the coffee.

Controls
This game requires a controller to be played.
Use the left Joystick to move the cup.
Press A to drink coffee.

This game was created in five days at the Workshop
Inbetween Animation and Gamedesign at Fantoche 2021

A Game by
Jill Vágner | 2D Artist, Sound Design | @jillbeart
Moreno Vogel | Animation, Programming, Music, Sound Design | portfolio
Ben Siegentaler | Gameplay Programming

Used Software
Unity
Photoshop
Fmod
Reaper
Ableton Live

Used Assets
2D animation package by Unity
DoTween Pro
